summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1361, for the improvement of Virginia Street, in the City of Seattle, from Minor Avenue to Westlake Avenue, by grading and regrading the same, and by constructing wooden curbs and gutters, together with all necessary bulkheads, or retaining walls, and the readjustment and extension of the existing sewer system and water mains system, under Ordinance No. 15021 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
